summary: Completed comprehensive testing of AI-Powered Stock Market Prediction & Portfolio Risk Advisory System. Fixed critical JSX syntax error in StockAnalysis.jsx. Backend APIs working at 91.7% success rate, frontend core functionality working well.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 403 instead of 401 for unauthorized access
Accepts invalid prediction days (999) and returns 200 instead of 400

fixed_bugs.issue: Missing </TabsList> closing tag causing JSX compilation error
fixed_bugs.fix_applied: Added missing </TabsList> closing tag on line 315

minor_issues.issue: Search results may not appear immediately for some queries
minor_issues.impact: Minor UX issue - search functionality works but may need timeout adjustment

action_item_for_main_agent: Minor backend validation improvements needed: (1) Return 401 instead of 403 for unauthorized access, (2) Add input validation for prediction days parameter. Stock search UX could be improved with better timeout handling.
